review_text:
Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Wakad, Pune, stands as a premier destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. Spanning over 12 lakh square feet of leasable area across 16 acres, it is recognized as the largest shopping center in Pune.  Ôøº Ôøº

The mall hosts an impressive collection of over 350 national and international brands, including anchor stores like H&M, Lifestyle, Marks & Spencer, Reliance Trends, Westside, Hamley‚Äôs, and Shopper‚Äôs Stop.  Shoppers can also find star brands such as Swarovski and Nautica, catering to diverse fashion preferences.  Ôøº Ôøº

Dining options are abundant, with more than 75 establishments offering a variety of cuisines. The Oasis Food Court, one of the largest in the city, features notable restaurants like Punjab Grill, Copper Chimney, Third Wave Coffee, and Blue Tokai.  Ôøº Ôøº

Entertainment is a key highlight, featuring a 14-screen INOX megaplex equipped with 2,200 seats for a world-class cinematic experience.  Family-friendly attractions include Timezone and Fun City, offering activities like bowling, arcade games, and virtual reality experiences.  Ôøº Ôøº

Architecturally, the mall boasts three distinctive atriums‚ÄîPlaza Flourish, Rains of Nourish Atria, and Opulent Atrium‚Äîblending contemporary and futuristic designs. A musical fountain, the Fountain Plaza, serves as a focal point, surrounded by landscaped greenery and art-deco installations.  Ôøº

Accessibility is well-planned, with multiple entry points, hassle-free drop-offs across three levels, and a nine-level parking facility.  The mall‚Äôs strategic location on the Pune-Bangalore Highway, near Sayaji Hotel, ensures convenient connectivity.  Ôøº Ôøº

Sustainability initiatives include rainwater harvesting systems and a 1.5-ton organic waste converter, reflecting the mall‚Äôs commitment to eco-friendly practices.  Ôøº

The mall is expected to generate employment for more than 10,000 individuals directly and indirectly, contributing significantly to the local economy

Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Wakad, Pune, is a remarkable shopping and leisure destination that offers a world-class experience. Spread across a vast area, this mall stands out as a premium hub for shopping, dining, and entertainment. Its architecture is modern and visually appealing, with a well-designed layout that ensures convenience for visitors.

The mall houses an impressive mix of national and international brands, catering to diverse shopping needs, from fashion and electronics to home d√©cor. For food lovers, the mall boasts a variety of dining options, including high-end restaurants, casual eateries, and a spacious food court serving multiple cuisines. The quality and ambiance of these outlets make it a delight for food enthusiasts.

Entertainment options here are plentiful, with a state-of-the-art multiplex that promises an immersive movie-watching experience. Families and children can also enjoy dedicated play zones and frequent live events or promotions hosted within the mall premises.

What sets Phoenix Mall apart is its attention to detail, such as ample parking space, clean restrooms, and courteous staff who ensure a pleasant visit. Additionally, the mall is wheelchair accessible, making it inclusive for all visitors.

However, during peak hours, the crowd can be overwhelming, which may slightly affect the shopping experience. Some might also find the premium brands a bit pricey, but the quality and variety offered justify the cost.

Overall, Phoenix Mall of the Millennium is not just a shopping destination but a place to unwind and enjoy quality time with friends and family. Whether you're looking for a shopping spree, gourmet meals, or entertainment, this mall has something for everyone. A must-visit spot in Pune for a luxurious and fulfilling experience!

You will love the decorations in the mall which keeps getting updated from time to time as per the upcoming festivals and occasions. You also have a state of the art multipex with IMAX screen here.

review_text:
Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Wakad, Pune, stands out as a premier lifestyle destination, offering a blend of shopping, dining, and entertainment experiences.

üõçÔ∏è Shopping Experience

Spanning 15 acres, the mall houses a diverse mix of international and Indian brands, including Zara, H&M, Mango, Shoppers Stop, Puma, and Pantaloons.  This variety caters to a wide range of fashion preferences, making it a go-to spot for shoppers seeking both luxury and everyday essentials  .

üçΩÔ∏è Dining Options

The food court boasts an array of choices, from global chains like McDonald's, KFC, Starbucks, and Tim Hortons to local favorites such as Punjab Grill and You Mee.  For those craving Asian cuisine, EIGHT offers commendable sushi and dim sum, though some dishes like the Tonkotsu Ramen have room for improvement  .

üé¨ Entertainment & Amenities

Entertainment enthusiasts can enjoy a state-of-the-art 14-screen IMAX multiplex, ensuring a top-notch cinematic experience.  Families with children will appreciate Fun City, an indoor amusement center filled with rides and games tailored for younger visitors  . Additional amenities include free Wi-Fi, concierge services, and facilities catering to parents and individuals with special needs  .

üöó Accessibility & Parking

While the mall is conveniently located near the Pune-Bangalore Highway and close to the Bhujbal Chowk Metro Station, parking can be challenging, especially during weekends.  Visitors have reported delays of up to 45 minutes in finding parking spots, with limited staff to manage the weekend traffic  .

üßº Facilities & Cleanliness
The mall is generally well-maintained, offering a pleasant ambiance for shoppers.  However, some patrons have noted a shortage of washrooms, which can be an inconvenience during peak hours  .

Events & Ambiance

Phoenix Mall of the Millennium frequently hosts live performances, pop-up exhibitions, and seasonal sales, enhancing the overall shopping experience.  The mall's decor, inspired by Parisian themes, adds a touch of elegance to its atmosphere  .

---

‚úÖ Final Verdict

Phoenix Mall of the Millennium offers a comprehensive shopping and entertainment experience in Pune's Wakad area.  While it excels in brand variety and amenities, visitors should plan their trips during off-peak hours to avoid parking hassles and potential overcrowding.
Huge mall with huge rush during evening hrs and weekends. Parking charges are ‚Çπ50 for the car. Food court is nice but long waiting during weekends. Time zones and fun city kids zones are there.

The mall is a perfect gateway for some relaxation, window shopping and varied delicious eateries. The theater located at the top floor makes it a perfect package to spend some quality time with family and friends amid diverse brands across different categories.

review_text:
## Phoenix Mall of the Millennium: A PCMC Giant Awakens

The Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Wakad is poised to become a crown jewel in the PCMC area. While it's not yet fully operational, glimpses of its stunning design hint at a truly impressive shopping experience.

This mall isn't just big, it's enormous. it will be a one-stop destination for everything from fashion and electronics to entertainment and dining.

But the Phoenix Mall of the Millennium isn't just about scale. The architectural design itself is generating a lot of buzz. a modern and stylish aesthetic that will create a memorable atmosphere for visitors.

This mall has the potential to be a game-changer for PCMC, offering a world-class shopping and entertainment experience for residents.

Newly made mall
Amazing and world class architecture
Beautiful chandeliers and statues inside
Best brand stores are here including H&M, M&S, bath and body shop, body shop, levis, Aurelia, Louis Philipe etc..
Very clean and hygienic washrooms
Huge parking area

Overall very good

I recently visited the Mall of the Millennium, expecting a convenient and enjoyable shopping experience. Unfortunately, my visit was marred by two significant issues.

Firstly, I used the hydraulic parking facility, which damaged my car's antenna. I hope the mall management takes steps to ensure that their parking facilities are safe and well-maintained.

Secondly, I was disappointed to find that the mall did not provide any pram or stroller facilities for infants. As a parent, it's essential to have access to such facilities, especially when visiting a large mall with a lot of walking involved. This lack of consideration for families with young children was surprising and inconvenient.

Overall, my experience at the Mall of the Millennium was disappointing, and I hope that the management takes my feedback seriously and makes the necessary improvements.
what_response: We sincerely apologize for your experience not being up to par. Your satisfaction is important to us, and we appreciate your feedback. We're committed to addressing your concerns and hope you'll give us another chance to improve.

review_text: Mall is good but maintenance should be proper. Safety should not be ignored. I saw some glass railings are not fitted properly. I tried to mention that to mall authorities but I couldn't find easy way online. So writing this review.

The establishment is good for shopping. But the management is poorly advised on managing people visiting. Parking is a greater task than driving to the place.
There are more puzzling floor indicators than actually solving the maze of life. Staff is very very rude especially when asked how to get from the parking to the mall. I wouldn‚Äôt want to visit this one again in a few years until I have forgotten how traumatic it was last Sunday.

Mall's architecture is nice and they have all international brands. There is also live screens and water fountain show outside on song bits. Also food court's interior is beautiful and There is live screening of matches of Asia Cup with proper sitting chairs.

A very very beautiful mall, excellent cleanliness. There are all sorts of stores and many international brands available at this mall. The parking is also ample and overall a very organised mall. Loved the experience of visiting this mall.
what_response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience! We're delighted you choose Phoenix Mall of the Millennium for your shopping and look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable visit!

review_text:
The mall is huge and has all the stores that you expect for a one stop shopping experience.

They have tried to make the interiors extravagant - some of which are cool while most are tacky.

There is a set of mechanised colored fountains in the front of the property which is fun for kids.

The mall is big and the first of this size in this area so the footfall is very high. There is a continuous inflow of vehicles.

The pedestrian walkway on the outside of the mall runs along the motorway with no concrete safety partition which is risky and a hazard which would account to faulty design.

There are store locators across the mall which is very helpful. The gents toilets are clean and plenty though the stalls are fitted at the wrong height - the partitions are tall enough and they could be installed higher to provide more privacy.

The mobile network coverage inside the mall is dismal and there is no guest wifi available in case you need it.

Just below the food court there a small seating area with a large curved screen where they were playing a cricket match. There is also a small podium which I believe would later be used for promotions and some performances.

Around the mall there is too much noise with a mix of fast music playing and hundreds of people talking making the environment very noisy.

There are some locations for selfies which people make good use of. The floor area of the mall is large so there is a lot of opportunities to display art and sculpture. I wish there were more seating options for visitors which I am hoping will come up once the mall is fully operational.

I am not sure the residents at the apartment complex just across the road are having a great time with all the rush that happens with a big mall. I hope that lights, music and the traffic on the small road is not becoming a daily nuisance.

This mall has the collection of good brands, the collectives has premium brands, where as H&M, zara have their own outlet, it has good restaurants and excellent gaming zones.. overall a great place to hangout

Good place for shopping and having lunch/brunch. Although the parking line is a bit too long on weekends. The collection of restaurants and caf√©s is quite exquisite. Also, the fountains and flamingo structures look fabulous in the evening.
The worst managed mall ever. Long lines to enter no parking and no valet parking too.. Never visit this mall on off days.

Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Wakad, Pune, is a large and modern shopping center that covers more than 1.2 million square feet. It has over 350 stores, including popular brands like H&M, Lifestyle, and Marks & Spencer. There are also luxury brands like Swarovski and Nautica.

The mall is more than just a place to shop‚Äîit has a 14-screen INOX movie theater and lots of food options with 19 restaurants. For fun, it features family attractions like TimeZone and FunCity, making it a great spot for families to enjoy.

Located in a growing area of Wakad, the mall is designed with the environment in mind, using rainwater harvesting and waste-recycling systems. It's easy to reach thanks to the infrastructure around it, and it aims to be a top destination for shopping and entertainment in Pune.

Right off the bat, I was met with traffic on the small road. The road planning to go to this mall is not great. Cars coming from the highway side have to face a stark 90 degree right, cross the road, and go inside. Cars on the other side have to wait a lot. Chaos.

Other problem is the parking. There are close to 4-5 entries in the mall, and every where I was stopped and asked to go to 2 wheeler entry road, which absolutely nobody could tell where it was. Eventually, tired and getting hot in the sun, I decided to park on the road.

The mall construction is good, but navigation inside it is IMPOSSIBLE. there is a tablet on each floor, and it helps, but to get to it you have to walk for 200 300 meters. The boards on each floor DONOT explain properly which store is where. Infact on floor 1,i saw names of shops from floor 2. Confusing.

The whole place is like the Indraprastha. Smooth tiles which people casually fall from, reflections everywhere. Could have worked there better?

Shops are good though. The new Tim Hortons is here. It's costly, but it's just a personal opinion.

Nonas pizza place was good. They make sourdough, its awesome.

But again, navigation. Exits are not exactly clear, and it took me half an hour to get where my scooter was.

Shops are good, but the mall experience was poor for me

review_text:
Retail Haven: A Stellar Experience at Phoenix Shopping Mall

As a seasoned shopper with a penchant for premium retail destinations, my recent visit to Phoenix Shopping Mall left an indelible mark of excellence. Nestled in the heart of pcmc, this shopping haven embodies the epitome of a comprehensive and luxurious retail experience.

Upon entering, I was greeted by an ambiance that seamlessly fused modern aesthetics with a welcoming atmosphere. The meticulously designed layout showcased a diverse array of high-end brands and boutiques, catering to a spectrum of tastes and preferences.

Phoenix Mall's curated selection of stores reflects a commitment to offering only the finest in fashion, electronics, and lifestyle products. From internationally acclaimed brands to local gems, the variety is not only extensive but thoughtfully chosen, creating an elevated shopping journey for the discerning consumer.

Navigating through the mall was a pleasure in itself, with ample space and strategically placed seating areas providing moments of respite. The clean, well-maintained interiors added to the overall sense of sophistication, making each storefront a portal to a world of premium offerings.

The dining options at Phoenix Mall deserve special commendation. The gastronomic landscape, ranging from chic cafes to gourmet restaurants, offered a diverse culinary experience. The attention to detail in both ambiance and menu selection showcased the mall's commitment to providing a holistic and indulgent shopping escapade.

Moreover, the customer service at Phoenix Shopping Mall was noteworthy. Polite and well-informed staff members were readily available, adding an extra layer of professionalism to the overall experience. Their attentiveness contributed to a seamless and enjoyable shopping excursion.

In conclusion, Phoenix Shopping Mall stands as a retail oasis where luxury, variety, and customer satisfaction converge. It caters not just to the act of shopping but to the art of curated indulgence. I wholeheartedly recommend Phoenix Mall to fellow aficionados of fine living and style, for it epitomizes the pinnacle of retail sophistication.

Cheers to Phoenix Shopping Mall ‚Äì a destination that transforms shopping into an elevated and gratifying experience. I eagerly anticipate my next visit to explore the ever-evolving retail landscape at this esteemed establishment.

review_text:
Nestled in the heart of the city, Phoenix Mall of the Millennium stands as a beacon of opulence and modernity, offering an unparalleled shopping and entertainment experience. Having recently visited this illustrious destination, I am thrilled to share my review of this remarkable establishment.

The moment you step into Phoenix Mall of the Millennium, you are greeted by an atmosphere of sophistication and grandeur. The architectural marvel boasts an impressive array of upscale stores, featuring renowned national and international brands across fashion, electronics, beauty, and beyond. Whether you're in search of haute couture, designer accessories, or the latest gadgets, Phoenix Mall delivers an unmatched shopping experience that caters to the most discerning tastes.

Beyond its exquisite shopping options, Phoenix Mall offers a gastronomic journey like no other. From fine dining restaurants serving gourmet cuisine to trendy cafes and artisanal eateries, the culinary landscape at Phoenix Mall is a true delight for food connoisseurs. Whether you crave global flavors or local delicacies, there's a dining establishment to satisfy every palate and occasion.

But the allure of Phoenix Mall extends far beyond its retail and culinary offerings. The entertainment options are equally captivating, with a state-of-the-art multiplex cinema showcasing the latest blockbuster films in immersive theater settings. Additionally, the entertainment zone features an array of engaging activities for visitors of all ages, ensuring that there's never a dull moment at Phoenix Mall.

What truly sets Phoenix Mall apart is its commitment to excellence in every aspect of the visitor experience. Impeccably maintained facilities, attentive staff, and seamless navigation contribute to a memorable and hassle-free shopping excursion.

Furthermore, Phoenix Mall's commitment to sustainability and community engagement adds another layer of appeal, reflecting its dedication to social responsibility.

Recently due its popularity there was flood of people visiting Mall and experience the luxury and interior design of the Mall. Unfortunately they have to close the Mall entrance as they were over crowded.

In conclusion, Phoenix Mall of the Millennium stands as a shining testament to luxury, innovation, and unparalleled hospitality. Whether you're seeking a day of indulgence, entertainment, or simply wish to immerse yourself in a world of elegance and refinement, Phoenix Mall exceeds expectations and emerges as a destination of choice for discerning shoppers and leisure seekers alike.

review_text:
Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Pune is a great addition to the city's shopping scene. Located in Wakad, it offers a wide array of retail options, from popular national brands to some international ones. The mall is spacious and well-maintained, providing a comfortable shopping environment.
One of the highlights is the variety of food and beverage options available, catering to different tastes. Whether you're looking for a quick bite in the food court or a relaxed dining experience at one of the restaurants, you'll find something to your liking.
For entertainment, the mall houses INOX Megaplex, offering a good movie-watching experience with multiple screens. There's also a Timezone and Fun City for those looking for arcade games, bowling, and other recreational activities, making it a decent spot for families and youngsters.
While the mall is generally good, some visitors have noted that parking, especially on weekends, can be challenging and time-consuming. The internal layout and navigation within the mall could also be slightly improved for easier movement between stores.
Overall, Phoenix Mall of the Millennium is a solid option for shopping, dining, and entertainment in Pune, particularly for those residing in and around the Wakad area. It provides a comprehensive mall experience, although being mindful of potential parking issues during peak hours is advisable.

review_text:
*Phoenix Mall of Millennium, Pune: A Shopper's Paradise*

Located in the heart of Pune, Phoenix Mall of Millennium is a shopper's paradise that offers an unparalleled retail experience. With over 250+ stores, this mall is a haven for those who love to shop, dine, and entertain themselves.

*Shopping*

The mall boasts an impressive collection of brands, ranging from affordable fashion to luxury labels. Some of the popular stores include:

- Fashion: H&M, Zara, Forever 21, and more
- Footwear: Nike, Adidas, Reebok, and more
- Lifestyle: Westside, Pantaloons, and more

*Dining*

Phoenix Mall of Millennium offers a diverse range of dining options, including:

- Fine dining: Italian, Chinese, Indian, and more
- Casual eats: Food courts, cafes, and quick-service restaurants
- Desserts: Specialty dessert shops and cafes

*Entertainment*

The mall features a state-of-the-art PVR cinema with multiple screens, showing the latest Bollywood and Hollywood releases. Additionally, there's a gaming zone and other entertainment options for kids and adults.

*Ambiance*

The mall's interior is sleek and modern, with ample natural light and comfortable seating areas. The staff is friendly and helpful, ensuring a pleasant shopping experience.

*Overall Experience*

Phoenix Mall of Millennium is a must-visit destination for anyone looking for a world-class shopping experience in Pune. With its vast array of stores, dining options, and entertainment facilities, this mall has something for everyone.

*Rating: 5/5*

Whether you're a shopaholic, a foodie, or just looking for a fun day out, Phoenix Mall of Millennium is an excellent choice. I highly recommend visiting this mall and experiencing it for yourself!

Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Wakad, Pune, offers an unparalleled shopping experience. This expansive mall features multi-brand showrooms, an INOX cinema, and a variety of food courts and restaurants, all supported by ample multi-story parking. The architectural lighting design is exceptional, making it a photogenic destination. This season, the mall's captivating theme is based on flamingo migration, and the musical fountain show at the entrance adds a mesmerizing touch to the overall ambiance.

review_text:
Just for a change and request from family to visit somewhere on new year, so planned to visit there as I heard about this new mall a lot so my expectations were high. That could be my mistake.
I reached the mall around 5.30pm and the very first challenge there was my car parking. There was no clear sign or instruction for entry towards car parking. When I reached to parking gate, I got to know that the parking gate is not opened and have to entered through other gate. I turned my car back and reached to other gate. I was wondering security guard was not    giving any indication. However I parked my vehicle at P2 some how but there were no entry from the P2 to the mall. To enter into the mall, have to go lower ground using staircase. We entered the mall on UG floor and started roaming and exploring all the floors and some of the shops. My kids were feeling hungry so I found Burger King outlet there so entered and got the table. Here my experience was very bad. Firstly, there was no order accepted on the counter so insisted on placing the order using their order placement machine and secondly, I got disappointed again as the machine was not accepting payments from any of the mode. You need to take receipt and table no. to the counter again for payment. 3rd disappointment was they were not accepting Sodexo voucher. However we had burgers and got rid of our hunger. Afterwards visited all the floors and shops then finally reached to the food court for dinner but it was fully occupied and nothing there to seat. We got out from the mall without having dinner.

Despite my disappointment, I must say the ambience and decoration was impressive though it was not big enough but good. Though it was not worth to visit from Dhanori. Marketcity mall is good than this.

I may not visit this mall again.

I liked the ambience of the mall and enjoyed my time there, there are a range of outlets from clothing to electronics to food.

I also watched movies there once and it was a positive experience.

I had been to the food court twice. Once at Wow! China and then to The Doner Company. Both the times I didn't enjoy the sizzlers at the food court, though it was cooked fine, it wasn't what I had expected. The first time around at Wow! China, it was more of a fried rice and manchurian with a ball of smoke underneath the plate to create an illusion that it's sizzling. Also, the other food outlets stopped serving since it was getting late so I was left with only a few options.

The second time around at The Doner Company, the sizzler looked appetizing but there was hardly any chicken and only vegetables and noodles on the platter. Also, the salt in the food wasn't as expected (not sure if it was more or less but it wasn't the right amount).

We ended up spending a bomb there (upward of Rs. 1000 in total) and I wasn't satisfied with the food experience at all.

Also in the arcade games arena, you can't pay for one game and play it. You have to reload a full card with 11 plays for INR 1600 "only", and the validity is just some days. So if you're coming once or are an outsider or living in PMC, you can't make your kids enjoy 1-2 games other than if you've come in a big group so that you can distribute the 'packaged' games within the kids in your group.

Nothing attractive other than a big mall with many shops. Seems to have opened the mall and are using the parking fees to offset the running cost.

Give it a miss or if you're not going in a group you can do timepass.

review_text:
Phoenix Marketcity, located in Viman Nagar, Pune, is one of the city‚Äôs premier shopping and entertainment destinations. This sprawling mall offers a perfect blend of shopping, dining, and leisure, making it a favorite among locals and tourists alike.

The mall boasts an impressive range of stores, featuring both international and domestic brands. From luxury fashion labels like Zara, H&M, and Aldo to budget-friendly options, there is something for everyone. It‚Äôs an ideal spot for fashion enthusiasts and those looking for the latest trends in clothing, footwear, and accessories.

Beyond shopping, Phoenix Marketcity stands out for its diverse dining options. The food court, with its wide variety of cuisines, caters to every palate, while fine-dining restaurants like Chili‚Äôs and Punjab Grill offer a more premium experience. Quick bites and coffee shops like Starbucks are perfect for casual hangouts.

The mall‚Äôs entertainment facilities are another highlight. PVR Cinemas offers an exceptional movie-going experience, and the arcade section is a big hit with families and kids. Events, live performances, and seasonal decorations enhance the overall ambiance, particularly during festivals.

The infrastructure is modern and spacious, with clean interiors and ample seating areas. Escalators and elevators are well-placed, ensuring easy navigation. Parking, although large, can be challenging during weekends or holidays due to high footfall.

One minor downside is the crowd during peak hours, which can make the experience slightly hectic. Additionally, prices at some outlets and restaurants may seem steep.

Overall, Phoenix Marketcity Pune delivers a vibrant and comprehensive experience, combining shopping, food, and entertainment in one place. Its modern amenities and lively atmosphere make it a must-visit destination for a day out in the city.

Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Pune is a fantastic shopping and entertainment destination! Located in the heart of the city, it offers a wide variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options that make it a great spot for a day out with family or friends.

The mall is spacious, well-lit, and beautifully designed. The collection of stores is impressive, ranging from high-end brands to more affordable ones, so there‚Äôs something for everyone. Whether you're looking for fashion, electronics, or home decor, you‚Äôll find a diverse range of options.

The food court is another highlight, with a good mix of local and international cuisine. There are also plenty of standalone restaurants and cafes spread across the mall, making it easy to grab a meal or relax with a coffee after shopping.

For entertainment, the mall features a large multiplex theater with the latest releases, and there‚Äôs even a gaming zone for kids and adults alike. Plus, the parking is spacious and well-organized, which makes the experience even more convenient.

Overall, Phoenix Mall of the Millennium is a must-visit if you‚Äôre in Pune. It has a great vibe, a mix of shopping and entertainment, and excellent facilities. Highly recommended for a fun, hassle-free day out!

Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Wakad is an exceptional shopping destination and truly stands out as one of Pune's finest malls. From the moment you enter, the mall's modern architecture and upscale ambiance create an inviting and luxurious experience. The spacious layout is thoughtfully designed, making it easy to navigate while offering a visually pleasing environment.

The shopping options are impressive, with a vast array of high-end brands as well as more affordable choices, catering to all kinds of shoppers. The dining options are equally varied, with an extensive food court and multiple fine-dining restaurants serving a range of cuisines. The quality of food is top-notch, making it a great place for foodies to explore.

For entertainment, the mall offers plenty, from a state-of-the-art cinema to a dedicated kids' play area, ensuring there's something for everyone. The cleanliness and maintenance of the premises are commendable, and the staff members are friendly and helpful, adding to the positive experience.

Parking is well-organized, though it can get a bit crowded on weekends, so arriving a bit early is recommended. Overall, Phoenix Mall of the Millennium provides an unparalleled shopping and leisure experience, making it a top choice for anyone in or around Pune. A true five-star destination!

Good Things About Mall of Millennium, Wakad
Mall of Millennium in Wakad is a popular shopping and entertainment destination. Here are some of its highlights:

Diverse Shopping Options
Wide range of brands: From international fashion labels to local boutiques, the mall caters to various tastes and budgets.
Variety of stores: You can find everything from clothing and accessories to electronics, home decor, and more.
Entertainment for All Ages
Fun City: This entertainment zone offers a plethora of games, rides, and activities for kids.
Movie theaters: Enjoy the latest blockbusters on the big screen with state-of-the-art sound and visuals.
Food court: A wide selection of cuisines to satisfy every palate.
Modern Amenities
Spacious and well-lit: The mall offers a comfortable shopping experience.
Ample parking: No worries about finding a parking spot.
Good food options: From casual dining to fine dining, there's something for everyone.
Regular Events and Promotions
The mall often hosts events, fashion shows, and promotions, making it an exciting place to visit.
Overall, Mall of Millennium in Wakad is a great place to spend time with friends and family, shop, eat, and be entertained.

review_text:
Millennial Mall in Pune stands out as a premier shopping destination that offers a comprehensive and luxurious experience for visitors. Housing an extensive range of brands, this mall caters to a diverse clientele, ensuring that everyone finds something to their taste. From high-end fashion labels to popular everyday brands, Millennial Mall's retail selection is impressive, making it a one-stop shop for all your needs.

Food enthusiasts will find the mall particularly appealing, with its diverse range of dining options. Whether you're in the mood for a quick snack, a gourmet meal, or a relaxing cup of coffee, the array of food courts, restaurants, and coffee shops will not disappoint. The culinary choices range from local Indian delicacies to international cuisines, ensuring a satisfying experience for every palate.

Home decor shoppers will find Millennial Mall to be a treasure trove of options. The mall features numerous stores dedicated to home furnishings, decor, and accessories, offering everything from modern minimalist designs to traditional handcrafted pieces. This makes it an ideal destination for anyone looking to revamp their living space or find unique decorative items.

The mall also caters comprehensively to families, with a wide range of shops for men, women, and children. Fashion boutiques, sports stores, and toy shops ensure that all age groups and interests are covered. The spacious and well-designed layout of the mall makes navigating through its vast array of offerings a pleasant experience.

In addition to shopping and dining, Millennial Mall also hosts various events and activities, adding to the overall entertainment value. Regular promotions, seasonal sales, and interactive sessions ensure that there is always something new and exciting happening at the mall.

In summary, Millennial Mall in Pune is more than just a shopping center; it is a lifestyle destination. With its wide range of brands, diverse dining options, extensive home decor stores, and family-friendly environment, it promises a fulfilling and enjoyable experience for all visitors.

review_text:
Extensive Brand Selection: Housing over 300 stores, the mall boasts a diverse mix of international and Indian brands. From high-end labels like Gucci and Zara to popular department stores like Shoppers Stop and Pantaloons, there's something for every taste and budget.

Entertainment Galore: This isn't just a shopping mall; it's an entertainment hub. A state-of-the-art multiplex cinema allows you to catch the latest blockbusters. Families can have a blast at the bowling alley or the indoor amusement park.

Foodie Paradise: Craving Indian street food or a sit-down Italian meal? The mall's food court offers a wide range of cuisines, with options to suit all budgets and dietary preferences. Upscale restaurants provide a fine-dining experience, while familiar chains like McDonald's and Subway are present for those seeking a quick bite.

Pleasant Ambiance: The mall's design is modern and spacious, with ample natural light filtering through the glass ceilings. Wide walkways and comfortable seating areas make navigating the mall a breeze. Water features and carefully placed greenery add a touch of nature to the interior.

Convenience: Ample parking (though it can get crowded during peak hours) and amenities like clean restrooms and baby care rooms make the mall a convenient choice for families and those with special needs.

review_text:
I recently visited this mall and was thoroughly impressed! The mall has a great selection of brand stores, including some high-end designer boutiques and popular fast fashion retailers. The stores are well-maintained and the sales staff are friendly and helpful.

The cafeteria is also a highlight, with a wide range of food options to suit all tastes and dietary requirements. The food is fresh and delicious, and the seating area is clean and comfortable.

But what really sets this mall apart is the parking. The parking lot is spacious and well-designed, with plenty of spaces available even on busy weekends. The parking attendants are also very helpful and efficient.

Overall, I would highly recommend this mall to anyone looking for a great shopping experience. The combination of good brand stores, a nice cafeteria, and convenient parking makes it a must-visit destination.

Pros:

- Great selection of brand stores
- Nice cafeteria with a wide range of food options
- Spacious and well-designed parking lot
- Friendly and helpful sales staff and parking attendants

review_text:
Phoenix Mall of the Millennium sets the gold standard for shopping malls, offering an unparalleled experience that combines luxury, variety, and convenience. From the moment you step in, it's evident that this place is something special. It's exceptionally well-managed, with every detail thoughtfully curated to ensure visitors have a memorable time.

The mall boasts an impressive selection of both international and Indian brands, all known for their quality products. Whether you're in search of the latest fashion trends, electronics, or unique gifts, you'll find everything under one roof. The layout is big and organized, making it easy to navigate through the wide aisles and beautifully designed spaces.

Food enthusiasts will be delighted with the food court at Phoenix Mall. It offers a vast array of options, including a notable selection of Arabic cuisine, which is a rare find. The variety ensures that there's something to satisfy every palate, from quick bites to more leisurely dining experiences.

Parking is often a hassle at busy malls, but not here. Phoenix Mall of the Millennium offers ample and organized parking space with no time-bound pricing, which is a huge plus. This thoughtful approach allows visitors to enjoy their time at the mall without worrying about the clock ticking on their parking.

In summary, Phoenix Mall of the Millennium is more than just a mall; it's a vibrant hub for shopping, dining, and entertainment. With its exquisite selection of brands, diverse food court, and hassle-free parking, it's a five-star experience that beckons you to return time and again. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a top-notch mall experience.

review_text:
Most of reviews by the users here are based on the aura of the new mall and the satisfaction it is giving to the people living nearby. However comparing with other equivalent malls it has its own goods and bad. For example - number of escalators are good which has both up and down at the same point, unlike malls like Elpro where escalator to go up or down is always in opposite corners of the mall.
Washrooms here are big able to handle the crowd.
Food court ambience is good but to achieve that they have killed the count of tables, which now always makes it a struggle to get a table during peak times. However who wants to eat at odd times anyhow.
Since the mall is in a circle shape from inside, there is no easy way to go to the opposite side of the circle. One has to go round. A simple cut in between like mall of India in Noida would have been helpful. Seating space is only there for restaurants and food courts, ideally there is lot of space unutilized, where they can keep benches for people with kids.
Lot of reviews are here for inadequate parking. But people are spending lot of time to shop and eat here if we compare with other malls. However mall has decent parking space and capacity to hold the crowd. Number of lifts could have been increased.
Separate pick and drop for Ola Uber or Auto may help avoiding the traffic at the gate.
Been here more than a dozen times now, FASTag facility never worked even once for both of my cars. Security is sub standard, when compared to westend or pavilion mall. During peak rush they tend to miss the inspection of cars and people.

Overall this mall is a good shopping option but only on weekdays.

review_text:
Millennium Mall in Wakad offers a multifaceted shopping and entertainment experience that caters to a diverse audience. Spread across a considerable space, the mall boasts an impressive array of stores, dining options, and entertainment facilities.

One of the mall's standout features is its diverse range of retail outlets. From high-end fashion brands to local boutiques, Millennium Mall caters to various tastes and budgets. The well-curated selection ensures that shoppers can find everything from the latest fashion trends to unique, locally crafted items. The layout of the mall is user-friendly, making navigation easy and allowing visitors to explore the diverse offerings seamlessly.

The dining options at Millennium Mall add another layer to its appeal. A mix of international and local cuisines is available, providing a gastronomic journey for visitors. Whether one craves a quick bite or desires a leisurely dining experience, the mall offers a range of choices to satisfy every palate. The ambiance of the dining areas complements the overall aesthetic of the mall, creating a pleasant environment for patrons.

In terms of entertainment, Millennium Mall doesn't disappoint. The inclusion of a multiplex cinema enhances the overall experience, allowing visitors to catch the latest blockbuster films in a comfortable setting. Additionally, the mall often hosts events and activities, contributing to a vibrant atmosphere. From live performances to themed celebrations, there's always something happening, making each visit a unique and engaging experience.

The mall's infrastructure deserves commendation, with modern amenities and well-maintained facilities. Ample parking space, clean restrooms, and efficient security measures contribute to a hassle-free visit. The thoughtful design incorporates spacious walkways and seating areas, enhancing the overall comfort for shoppers and visitors.

Despite its numerous strengths, Millennium Mall does face some challenges. During peak hours, the mall can get crowded, leading to longer wait times at popular stores and eateries. Additionally, while the variety of brands is commendable, some patrons may feel that certain segments, such as electronics or home goods, could be further expanded to meet a broader range of consumer needs.

In conclusion, Millennium Mall in Wakad stands out as a comprehensive shopping and entertainment destination. Its diverse retail options, culinary delights, and entertainment facilities make it a go-to spot for individuals and families alike. The mall's commitment to providing a pleasant and dynamic environment is evident in its well-maintained infrastructure and regular events. While facing some challenges related to crowding and segment-specific offerings, Millennium Mall remains a key player in the region's retail and entertainment landscape. Whether for a shopping spree, a family outing, or a cinematic experience, Millennium Mall proves to be a compelling destination for residents and visitors alike.

Phoenix Mall of the Millennium is a massive, upscale shopping destination featuring all major brands and a wide variety of restaurants offering diverse cuisines. The mall is a popular spot, attracting huge crowds, especially on weekends. The highlight for families is the PVR-Inox multiplex with 14 screens, including the kid-friendly ‚ÄòKiddles‚Äô.

However, I have concerns regarding the mall‚Äôs impact on the neighboring residential area. The primary issue lies in the parking management. Entering the mall‚Äôs parking lot is a slow process, causing traffic jams on the already narrow roads. Additionally, there is a significant problem with two-wheeler parking. The mall‚Äôs security does not take action when visitors park their two-wheelers on the footpath, which should be reserved for pedestrians. This has led to a habitual inconvenience for the residents as the footpaths on both the front side and back gate of the mall are often blocked by parked vehicles.

I sincerely request the mall authorities to address these issues to maintain harmony with the neighboring community and improve the overall experience for all visitors.

review_text:
Phoenix Mall offers an absolutely delightful shopping experience. The moment you step inside, you're greeted by a wide and enticing array of stores, catering to all tastes and budgets. The spacious layout and meticulously designed interiors make it exceptionally easy to navigate, even during the busiest peak hours.

One of the mall's standout features is its incredibly diverse dining options. Whether you're in the mood for exquisite international cuisine, indulgent fast food, or a quick and satisfying coffee break, there's truly something to satisfy every palate. The food court buzzes with an impressive array of choices, and the restaurants offer a charming and inviting atmosphere for a sit-down meal.

Shopping enthusiasts will undoubtedly revel in the splendid variety of high-end brands and stores available. From opulent fashion boutiques to essential everyday retailers, Phoenix Mall truly leaves no shopper's desire unfulfilled. Frequent sales and discounts add an extra layer of allure, making it an unbeatable destination for bargain hunters.

Entertainment options are equally abundant and enthralling. The state-of-the-art multiplex cinema screens the very latest releases, ensuring a captivating cinematic experience. Meanwhile, the arcade and play areas provide endless fun for families, creating unforgettable moments. Additionally, the parking facilities are not only generally ample but also impeccably well-maintained.

The only minor drawback one might encounter is the mall's tremendous popularity, which occasionally results in sizable crowds, especially during weekends. However, this very popularity stands as a testament to its exceptional charm and the unparalleled shopping and dining experiences it consistently delivers.

Such a big mall with limited parking space or is it another way of making more money thru valet parking?

The newly opened Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Wakad is an absolute marvel that combines grandeur with an exceptional shopping and entertainment experience. With its colossal size and opulent architecture, it stands as a testament to modern design and luxury.The mall boasts an impressive array of high-end brands, both local and international, making it a shopper's paradise. From fashion boutiques to electronic stores, you can find virtually anything you desire. The sheer variety of dining options is staggering, catering to all tastes and preferences. Whether you're in the mood for fine dining or a quick bite, you won't be disappointed.Entertainment options abound with a state-of-the-art multiplex, an arcade for kids, and even a spa for those seeking relaxation. The well-maintained facilities, including clean restrooms and ample parking, ensure convenience for all visitors.The only drawback might be its size, as navigating through the mall can be overwhelming for some. Nonetheless, Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Wakad is a must-visit for those seeking an upscale shopping and entertainment destination. Its grandeur and diverse offerings make it a true landmark in the city, setting a new standard for shopping malls.

I visited the new Phoenix Millennium Mall in Wakad recently, and I must say, the ambience is truly impressive. The mall offers a spacious and modern environment that instantly puts you in a shopping mood. With its high ceilings and contemporary design, it's a refreshing change from the crowded spaces of older malls.

The size of the mall is another standout feature. It's huge, which means there's an abundance of retail stores and eateries to explore. Whether you're looking for fashion, electronics, or home goods, you're bound to find a wide range of options here.

Speaking of eateries, the mall doesn't disappoint in that department either. There's a diverse selection of food outlets, catering to various tastes and preferences. From fast food to fine dining, you can indulge in a culinary journey that suits your mood. Plus, the seating areas are comfortable and well-maintained, making it a great place to take a break and enjoy a meal.

In terms of shops, the variety is commendable. Whether you're a fashionista, tech enthusiast, or just looking for everyday essentials, the mall has you covered. The stores are well-organized, making it easy to browse and shop.

Overall, the new Phoenix Millennium Mall in Wakad offers a delightful shopping and dining experience. Its ambience, spaciousness, and diverse range of shops and eateries make it a must-visit destination for both residents and visitors in the area.

review_text:
Had a terrible experience at the Unicorn store in Phoenix, Wakad and they call themselves Apple "Premium" reseller. But their service and the overall experience in my interactions with them has been worse than a local phone shop. I have issues after issues with them. I remember visiting the OnePlus showroom and seeing more educated people there.

Issue 1: I went to purchase an iPhone 15 for my wife. On Sep 16. I asked about CC cashback and no cost EMI and the staff (Ms. Sumaya something I believe) said that we can avail those offers. Only to find out, at the billing desk that both of those weren't available.

Issue 2: The staff was just trying to get rid of us soon. We mentioned that data-wise, photos and WhatsApp history only was very important and that we backed up those to the cloud. It is the duty of the floor staff, who are apparently supposed to be well trained, to educate the customer, that WhatsApp on Android backs up dara on Google Drive and iOS retrieves backup only from iCloud. She didn't even take my consent when she selected what to back up from the Android via Move to iOS app. I have to start from scratch on iOS now without my decades worth of chat history. And for my wife's work, it was absolutely critical. In OnePlus store, I've had a much more premium experience!!!!

Issue 3: I had pre-booked an iPhone 16 (black, 256gb) as well. I had pre-booked on the day it was opened (Sep 13). After 6 days,  and one day before the official launch (today), I get an sms from a private unofficial number saying that the phone is unavailable because the "perticular model and color" (notice the incorrect grammar) is not available in stock. No regret or apologies for the inconvenience in that message. And no expectation setting on when i should be able to pick it up. I am pretty sure they're prioritising their personal contacts before mine.

If this is the level of service I'm getting pre-sales, I don't mind losing my ‚Çπ1,000 pre-booking amount, but I'm going to purchase my phone from Reliance or Croma.

Moral of the story: If you want a substandard, street shopping experience, please visit Unicorn Store in Phoenix Mall of the Millennium, Wakad.

review_text:
"Phoenix Mall of the Millennium: A New Gem in Pune's Landscape"

I recently had the pleasure of visiting Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Pune, and it left a lasting impression. The grandeur of the mall's architecture is truly commendable, providing a delightful backdrop to a memorable shopping experience.

Despite being a new addition to Pune's shopping scene, the mall's charm is undeniable. Although some shops are yet to open, the promise of a diverse shopping experience is evident. The spacious layout and modern design make navigating the mall a breeze, and the potential for a wide range of stores adds anticipation to future visits.

What stood out to me was the thoughtful mix of local and global brands, catering to diverse tastes. The ambiance is inviting, and it's clear that this mall has the potential to become a bustling hub for both locals and visitors.

While my visit coincided with the initial stages of the mall's operation, I could already envision Phoenix Mall of the Millennium becoming a go-to destination for shopping, entertainment, and relaxation in Pune. I look forward to seeing how this space evolves and recommend others to explore the unfolding chapters of this exciting shopping haven.
Variety of brands, food options, and the interior is eye catchy.

Phoenix Mall of the Millennium Wakad Is taking shape now.

Once completed it is expected to have high end luxury brand stores, multiplex etc.

Right now there is no direct connectivity from the Central Wakad area, There is a small land patch yet to be acquired, once it is, then direct connection will be there.
Lot of parking floors but mostly under construction. Avoid especially if you are going for movies.

The Phoenix Mall of Millenium is undeniably a beautiful and vibrant shopping destination. With its wide array of food options and diverse range of shopping outlets, it offers something for everyone. The mall is a shopper's paradise, with numerous stores and boutiques to explore, and a plethora of dining choices to satisfy any craving.

However, the mall's popularity has led to significant issues with overcrowding. During peak hours, the sheer volume of visitors can be overwhelming, making it challenging to navigate through the bustling crowds. This overcrowding also extends to the parking situation, as finding a spot can be a daunting task. Additionally, the high volume of traffic in the area due to the mall's popularity often leads to frustrating jams and delays.

While the Phoenix Mall of Millenium offers an extensive selection of amenities, the issues of overcrowding, limited parking availability, and traffic congestion can detract from the overall experience. Visitors should be prepared to navigate through large crowds and consider alternative transportation options when planning a visit.

Fully stuffed but surely visiting again.

Review: Phoenix Mall of Millennium, Wakad

I recently visited the Phoenix Mall of Millennium in Wauquad and was highly disappointed with the facilities provided in the feeding room. The room had only a single chair for sitting, which is inadequate for the number of mothers needing to use it. Moreover, there was no air conditioning or fan, making the room unbearably hot and uncomfortable.

To add to the inconvenience, many mothers, including visitors from abroad, were forced to wait outside the room. Shockingly, the security personnel were asking mothers to sit on the floor to feed their babies. For those who refused, they were given a mere two-minute time limit to feed, which is completely unrealistic and unacceptable.

Overall, the feeding room facilities at Phoenix Mall of Millennium are severely lacking and need immediate improvement to accommodate the needs of all mothers comfortably and respectfully.

review_text: Phoenix Mall of the Millennium in Wakad is an absolute treat for the senses right from the entrance. Greeted by a mesmerizing water fountain that sets a relaxing ambiance, one can't help but admire the intricate chandelier designs that are undoubtedly photo-worthy. Being a new establishment, its pristine cleanliness shines through, complemented by fresh stocks and the latest designs in stores. While a few shops are still gearing up to open, the majority are ready to serve. The mall's strategic location offers excellent connectivity to the Mumbai highway, Hinjewadi, and Wakad, making it accessible and convenient. Additionally, the spacious parking ensures a hassle-free experience. Looking forward to seeing the mall in its full glory once all the shops are up and running.

review_text: The size of this mall is impressive, with a vast array of stores to cater to every taste and need. Whether you're a fashionista hunting for the latest trends, a tech enthusiast in search of gadgets, or a foodie craving diverse culinary delights, this mall has it all.

üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü

Wow, what an experience! üëè

I recently visited this mall, and I must say, it left me speechless. While not all the stores have opened yet, the overall ambiance here surpasses its Viman Nagar counterpart. The food court is a real treat, with an array of stalls featuring new brands that I've never encountered before. It's a foodie's paradise! üçîüçüüåÆ

However, a word of advice: if you plan to visit, opt for weekdays to avoid the parking nightmare we endured. We spent a good 30 minutes just waiting for a parking spot! üòì Also, brace yourself for the first two months after opening, as weekends can get insanely crowded. It's worth the visit, but plan accordingly. üóìÔ∏è

On a positive note, it's reassuring to hear that the ACP of traffic is on top of the situation, working to alleviate the traffic congestion in and around the mall. üöóüö¶ Though it may take some time for these solutions to be implemented, it's a step in the right direction.

In conclusion, this mall has the potential to be a real gem in the city, but a bit of patience is required during its initial phase. So, gather your friends, plan your visit wisely, and get ready to be amazed! üõçÔ∏èüéâ #RetailTherapy #NewHotspot

review_text:
Hi Guys while most of the experience was decent ( mainly insignia) for other halls  one very big red flag is the food service when orders are to be delivered in the hall
I was watching kungfu panda in their Kiddies hall no 4 and had order 2 items to be delivered to the seat no. Note I had confirmed hall and seat nos twice at the food counter and I also made them write it on the bill
The movie ended and they never delivered my food worth 700 Rs.
Closer to the end of the movie when I enquired they said they delivered it to some " sir" ( note we were just 2 females )
Then I realised it was delivered to the wrong people who loved to enjoy free food at the cost of others.
Worse , the manager of this place Mahendra  Patil is clueless and has no manners to talk to a lady . He kept on asking me if I had received. the food and if I had told them the seat no correctly.
Not sure how he has been assigned as the manager.
His demeanor was so rude and casual as if nothing had happened and took forever to issue the refund as the food was of no use to me given the movie was over.
To add I could hardly see the movie towards the end properly given this incident. Overall very disorganised food court , poorly managed as even the billing takes so long given people are not properly trained to operate the billing counters . Clearly the manager is for namesake given I have been practically here almost every weekend.

Inspite of the mall ready for more than a year ago more than 50% shop space still vacant. Multiplex yet to come up. Approach roads are still in very bad shape. To achieve more stars rating, mall has to go long miles.

This is one of the very posh,biggest and highly decorated mall coming up in the city. Various types of branded  items/ articles  available in reasonable rates. All categories of people with family and beloved can enjoy the required purchasing at the  one place.

Excellent ambiance and must visit like mall
Parking is there but it was complicated and difficult to find out vehicle while returning
